comments.text: Why is nobody praising the vocalist, that guy has an amazing voice.
Ok, cranial cavitation bubbles is the most horrific thing I’ve heard today. That’s for sure.

I was totally dismayed to hear that you are planning only 2 more classes.  This is such a powerful teaching solution and with a totally knowledgeable instructor (you!) that it will be a real shame to see it stop.
"never play scrabble with a biologist" wise words indeed
I was starting to get worried that this update wouldn’t B. Goodenough but you came through in the last bit
